title: PBE
body: how do i get a pbe account?

replies.body: Should be able to get started [**right over here**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe)!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=rjdExHAp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-17T00:51:09.462+0000)
>
> Should be able to get started [**right over here**](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/pbe)!

still can't make one, comes up as "Something went wrong. Please refresh the page and try again." :(

When the page first launched it was under such heavy traffic that some users couldn't get through on the first try. Seems like it's still under quite a heavy load. Keep trying, and possibly try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if that helps, but you should be able to get through eventually.
